title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 14 - Investments In Corporations By Banks And Trust Companies
content:

State Regulations
§ 14.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 14.2 - Limitations
§ 14.3 - Investment procedures for operating subsidiaries and edge act subsidiaries
§ 14.4 - Investment procedures for other stock investments
§ 14.5 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 3, ch. I, pt. 14

Statutory authority: Banking Law, §§14, 97
[4-a]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
